1.title: Our Secret Brother

episode of.title: Last Hope with Troy Dunn (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Troy meets with Debra and Gary Sadler who, as teenagers, had a son but were forced to give him up for adoption. After college, they married and had two daughters, Leah and Sarah. Now, both parents and children have united to search for their one missing family member. If Troy can crack this case, he can unite a full biological family.

2.title: Family is Everything

episode of.title: Last Hope with Troy Dunn (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: David Myrom was adopted at birth and has often thought about finding his birth mother. After he suffers a horrible car accident, and faces the reality of death, he longs to meet the woman who gave him life. Will David find what the woman he's looking for or will Troy be faced with delivering devastating news?

3.title: A Mother's Lies

episode of.title: Last Hope with Troy Dunn (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: As a child, Amanda suffered abuse at the hands her mother's many boyfriends, one of whom she thought was her father. As an adult her mother revealed to her that the man she believed to be her dad was not her biological father. Now Amanda's on a mission to find her true father and the love she was missing all those years.

4.title: The Third Side

episode of.title: Last Hope with Troy Dunn (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Charles has two children he abandoned early on. Years later, he turned his life around and fathered two more children. Attempts to find his first two kids proved unsuccessful. Now that Charles has died, his son Rick wants to reach out to his half-siblings and let them know that their father continued to love them until his death.

5.title: A Dream for My Mother

episode of.title: Last Hope with Troy Dunn (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: When Pamela Yockey was 5, the police found her wandering the streets. She and her infant brother were removed from their parents and adopted out separately. It's been over thirty years since then, and Pam has not forgotten about her brother. She's tried to find him but her attempts have been futile. Troy is her last hope.

6.title: World Upside Down

episode of.title: Last Hope with Troy Dunn (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Roy Madding was just 4 years old when his father took his own life. His mother was pregnant at the time, but was too shaken by the incident to raise a second child and she gave her the baby up for adoption. Now grown, Roy has tried tirelessly to locate his younger brother. Can Troy find him and bring this broken family back together?

7.title: A Daughter Remembers

episode of.title: Last Hope with Troy Dunn (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Jacemyein Morales has lived her entire life thinking that her mother walked out on her, leaving her to be raised by an abusive father. Desperate to find out what could have caused her mother to leave, Jacemyein turns to Troy hoping he can piece together 30 years of lies and hopefully find the mother she's always dreamed of having.

8.title: Sins of the Father

episode of.title: Last Hope with Troy Dunn (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: When Renee Thomas was a little girl, her parents divorced and she only saw her father once. She suspects that he was unfaithful, but she doesn't know for sure. Her mother blocked communication between the two of them when she was young. Now that she's a grown woman, she's desperate to find her father and get answers.

9.title: He's My Brother

episode of.title: Last Hope with Troy Dunn (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Bonnie and her younger brother, Aaron suffered neglect at the hands of their alcoholic mother, who relinquished them both. Aaron ended up adopted by a wonderful family; Bonnie left home as a teen, broken by her addictions. Now sober and married, Bonnie longs to find the missing link to her past.

10.title: Shattered

episode of.title: Last Hope with Troy Dunn (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: In 1966, Chicago police discovered 10 year-old Rick Davis and his two sisters locked in a rat infested kitchen, malnourished and unclothed. The police immediately took them into custody but the children were sent to different homes and never saw each other again. Now Rick has reached out to Troy to help reunite this devastated family.

-1.title: I Never Forgot

episode of.title: Last Hope with Troy Dunn (TV Series 2015– )

imdb.title: Last Hope with Troy Dunn
akas: Last Hope with Troy Dunn (United States)
plot: This follows Mr Troy as he unravels the mystery behind lost and missing persons all around the world as he facilitates their inspiration reunions::Dusty Mahlaule
